product_matComplex
aggregate
{$match:{$and:[{"productfeature.nr":@ProductFeature1@}, {"productfeature.nr":{$ne:@ProductFeature2@}}, {"propertyNum1":{$gt:@x@}}, {"propertyNum3":{$lt:@y@}}]}}
{$project:{"label":1, "_id":0,"nr":1}}
{$lookup:{from:"producttypeproduct", localField:"nr",foreignField:"product", as:"type"}}
{$match:{"type.productType":@ProductType@}}
{$project:{"label":1, "nr":1}}
{$sort:{"label":1}}
{$limit:10}
